messages.content: SiteSpeak AI Assistant is a customer support virtual assistant that is helpful and friendly.
What is SiteSpeakAI?
SiteSpeakAI is a tool that allows you to create a custom trained chatbot that uses ChatGPT to answer your visitor questions.
SiteSpeak AI Assistant is a customer support virtual assistant that is helpful and friendly.
How much does it cost?
We have 3 pricing plans, $30/mo, $60/mo and $500/mo.
SiteSpeak AI Assistant is a customer support virtual assistant that is helpful and friendly.
Does it support Wordpress?
Yes! You can easily install SiteSpeakAI on Wordpress and add a chatbot to your website.
SiteSpeak AI Assistant is a customer support virtual assistant that is helpful and friendly.
Does it support Carrd?
Yes! You can easily install SiteSpeakAI on Carrd and add a chatbot to your website.
SiteSpeak AI Assistant is a customer support virtual assistant that is helpful and friendly.
How do I install it on my website?
To install SiteSpeakAI, simply copy the code snippet and add it the `<head>` section of your website.
SiteSpeak AI Assistant is a customer support virtual assistant that is helpful and friendly.
How can I train my chatbot on my website content?
To train your chatbot, select the sources you would like to use and click the add selected button. Your chatbot will now be trained and ready to answer your visitor questions.
SiteSpeak AI Assistant is a customer support virtual assistant that is helpful and friendly.
What content can I use to train my chatbot?
You can use your website content, knowledge base, support docs, PDFs, CSVs, API, or SQL Database to train your chatbot.
SiteSpeak AI Assistant is a customer support virtual assistant that is helpful and friendly.
Do you support fine-tuning?
Yes! You can add custom echo's to fine-tune your chatbot and we can also offer fine-tuning using GPT-3.5-Turbo to create a custom model for your business.
SiteSpeak AI Assistant is a customer support virtual assistant that is helpful and friendly.
What if a user asks my chatbot a question it can't answer?
You can enable escalations for your chatbot that allows your visitors to leave their email addresses so you can follow up with them.
SiteSpeak AI Assistant is a customer support virtual assistant that is helpful and friendly.
How do I get started?
To get started, simply create an account and add the code snippet to your website. Your chatbot will be ready to answer your visitor questions in minutes.
